title: Let's Make a Bird Feeder
subtle: How to (nonfiction), 73 words, Level D (Grade 1), Lexile 160L
description: Have you ever made a bird feeder? Let's Make a Bird Feeder provides students with a step-by-step guide on how to make a bird feeder using a pan, birdseed, fruit, and water. Simple instructions and photographs support student learning. The book can also be used to teach students how to visualize to understand text and to sequence events.
meta: bird feeder, birdseed, dried, fruit, hang, slices
